Question & Options:
Which statements are true regarding the production of *The Incredibles*?
Options:
A. A) Brad Bird pitched his story idea for *The Incredibles* to John Lasseter at Pixar.
B. B) Brad Bird directed *The Incredibles* and co-wrote its screenplay.
C. C) *The Incredibles* was developed from a superhero story idea by Brad Bird.
D. D) Pixar produced *The Incredibles* without any involvement from Brad Bird.
Correct Answer: A) Brad Bird pitched his story idea for *The Incredibles* to John Lasseter at Pixar., B) Brad Bird directed *The Incredibles* and co-wrote its screenplay., C) *The Incredibles* was developed from a superhero story idea by Brad Bird.
